info.description: Allows the creation, viewing and management of security orders
info.title: Order Security Orders APIs

price.description: The Price at which the NOMINAL.AMOUNT of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.

calculateCharges.description: Indiciates whether charges will be calculated. YES or NO.

chargesGrossOrNet.description: Indicates whether the cash amount is to include charges (NET) or havecharges applied in addition (GROSS). If NET, the nominal will be calculated so that when the charges are added to the transaction. If GROSS, the nominal is calculated then the charges are added. NET or GROSS

rounding.description: Defines the rounding type for the amount calculated or input

adjustCommission.description: Determine whether to reduce the commission in order to make the total trade match the cash amount exactly.

settlementCurrency.description: The currency of the trade settlement

brokerCommission.description: Specifies the amount of Broker Commission charged to the Customer for the tradeField length is 1-15 numeric characters with 0-9 decimal places.The number of decimal places is dependant on the number of decimal places stated on the CURRENCY file, for theTRADE.CCYInput will be carried forward into the subsequent field on SC.EXE.SEC.ORDERS record created

foreignFee.description: This field Records the Foreign Fee amount charged to the Customer for the trade.

stampTax.description: The Stamp Tax amount charged to the Customer for the trade

EBVFee.description: This field Records the amount of EBV Fees charged to the Customer for the trade.

miscellaneousFees.description: The amount of miscellaneous fees charged to the Customer for the trade

transactionChannel.description: The channel through which the transaction has been placed

tradeCurrency.description: The trade currency is the settlement currency for the trade

orderDate.description: The order date of the instructions contained within the transaction

orderedAt.description: The time at which the order has been transacted

orderType.description: Defines the order type of the transaction

limitPrice.description: The Price at which the shares are to be bought or sold

limitType.description: Defines the limit type for the trade

limitExpiryDate.description: This field specifies the validity of the Limit, i.e. how long is it to remain in force

depositoryId.description: The identifier of the depository. Must be a customerSecurity of type depository.

frontOfficeInstructions.description: Optional narrative field for any narrative for the account officer.Field for narrative associated with the Account Officer.Up to 40 alpahnueric characters (Optional Input).

approximateSettlementAmount.description: The order value (Nominal x Price ) for each customer in the security currency. If a limit price is input and transaction code is debit, lower price among market and limit price is used for sell and higher price is used for buy. If transaction code is credit, then lowest is used.

parent.description: This Field is to determine whether the order is a parent order, Allowed value is YES

parentReference.description: The parent reference that is common for both parent and child orders and will serve as a link.

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

orderStatus.description: The order status which can be OPEN, TRANSMITTED, REJECTED, CANCELLATION REQUEST, CANCELLED, MODIFICATION REQUEST, PARTIAL and FILLED

price.description: The Price at which the NOMINAL.AMOUNT of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.
